text: i know you should expect to spend a lot of money in vegas but better food can be had at better prices from better service elsewhere nn4 ladies ordered 4 drinks which came after our food and 3 appetizers didnt like the tuna or the quesadilla the duck was the only saving grace for a total of 115

this la club is your stereotypical elitist hotspot if youre not privileged enough to be on the guest list or possess prominent physical attributes forget about gaining entry essentially the usual queue turns into a paid lineup where each person shells out 50 or relies on their choice of clothing to catch attention which means that primarily men are left behind
can you recommend the topnotch obstetriciangynecologists in the area

the level of friendliness from the staff was exceptional and we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food we decided to try the gyro which was equally as delicious as what youd find elsewhere even though we arrived moments before closing the food tasted fresh and didnt have an outdated flavor the only downside was the omission of any leafy vegetables in the wrap i would definitely choose to eat at this restaurant again

the quality of the food is excellent with an average dinner cost of around 25 per person however they lack a strong sense of customer service and efficiency often requiring you to ask for drink refills napkins and your bill surprisingly the guy at the register even questioned me about not leaving a tip despite the poor service provided
we are not fans of dryaged meats as they usually have a rotten taste to us however the side dishes are okay and theres nothing remarkable that would make us highly recommend or want to come back here
if youre looking for excellent vegetarian cuisine dont miss the spicy po boy and mouthwatering chili fries
my family prefers to gather at this location although i have yet to find a meal that i genuinely enjoyed here the service was satisfactory but i never really feel completely satisfied when i leave

one of the women working there displayed bad attitude towards us and the restaurant had a limited selection of dishes the taste of the food was mediocre failing to meet our expectations given the price and quality of service despite this i can at least say that i was happy with how spotless everything was

are you exhausted from the same old sports clips or ordinary barbershops if so why not visit this unique place where the skilled barbers not only know how to give great haircuts but also create a fun and entertaining atmosphere they excel at shapeups fades and tapeups im really happy i discovered this gem in charlotte

whenever im in las vegas i always have the urge to visit this place for a latenight bite the food is decent the portions are huge and the prices are surprisingly reasonable for las vegas plus its spacious enough to accommodate large parties rumor has it that its owned by the same people as the cheesecake factory but i personally prefer this place because they offer a wide range of food options even for breakfast
gathering at this venue is a tradition for my family but ive never had a meal that i really enjoyed here the service was okay but i never leave feeling completely satisfied

these bagels are alright but i must say their drinks are absolutely delightful the blackberry lemonade is my personal favorite the interior may give off a sterile vibe but it does have air conditioning and clean bathrooms this is quite impressive especially since its located on state street

the service was extremely amicable and the food exceeded our expectations we opted for the gyro and found it to be on par with any other place despite arriving just 5 minutes before closing time the food remained fresh and did not have a stale taste the only drawback was the absence of any greens in the wrap without a doubt i would return to dine at this establishment
meh wont go back there are many other restaurants nearby around the same price point much better tasting and with friendlier service

describing it succinctly this type of asian cuisine presents a savory experience featuring cannedtasting sauces and meat its quality is reminiscent of frozen dinners found in grocery stores albeit at a greater cost

not worth going to poor customer service and crappy thin pizza just keep driving on by

choosing a wednesday night with moderate foot traffic i ventured out to a restaurant and opted for their medium traditional wings while satisfactory in taste they didnt exceed expectations although the service was commendable it couldve been faster an interesting perk to note is that they provided me with additional ranch dressing at no extra cost which is unusual since most establishments would charge for it another highlight of this venue is its abundance of television screens creating an inviting atmosphere for sport enthusiasts

i find these bagels to be acceptable although the drinks they offer are quite delicious personally i particularly enjoy their blackberry lemonade in terms of the atmosphere it may seem sterile but it has air conditioning and boasts clean bathrooms this is especially noteworthy considering its prime location on state street
no longer the human bean

im amazed by the new address at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc where you can find over 15 different varieties of chicken salad and delicious desserts such as hummingbird cake and cocacola cake its like homemade food and even featured on the popular food network for their famous buttered and grilled chicken on a new england roll the prices are also very reasonable

the idea of indulging in dryaged meats doesnt excite us because they typically have an unpleasant rotten taste nevertheless the sides here are satisfactory but theres nothing extraordinary that would justify raving about it or making us want to come back
among the options available the crab legs and shrimp were relatively satisfying yet not on par with the cosmopolitian

i have a deep affection for this establishment and i genuinely wish they had a presence in california whenever i find myself in arizona i make it a point to visit at least 23 times due to their consistently outstanding cuisine impeccable cleanliness and incredibly gracious and helpful staff members

overpriced mall i guess its for the tourist not locals lolz sometimes there are ok sales in the morning with coupons for the big stores like bloom macys etcnbut i rather should off the strap but if its a last minute thing that i need an outfit then this is the place to shop lolz

it was on a wednesday night that i made my way to a notsobusy restaurant at this establishment i decided to go for the medium traditional wings which turned out to be fairly enjoyable but nothing extraordinary the service provided was good overall despite being somewhat sluggish to my surprise i received complimentary extra ranch dressing which is usually subject to an additional charge at other places notably this venue boasts an impressive collection of around one hundred television screens making it an attractive destination for catching live sporting events
seafood isnt really my thing but i went to a seafood restaurant for my husbands birthday because he loves it there were nonseafood choices available that made me happy and my husband loved his meal
i will avoid going to that establishment due to the abysmal service it reminds me of other places with a similar lack of quality
the store was very busy but the service was slow because they didnt have enough employees

our dining experience tonight turned out to be quite dreadful particularly due to the fact that every single steak served at our table was incorrectly prepared surprisingly the one thing that managed to be properly executed was the crab but even that doesnt make up for such subpar quality in a supposedly renowned steakhouse

do you find yourself getting bored with the sports clips and regular barbershops then make your way to this extraordinary establishment where the barbers know how to give amazing haircuts while keeping the atmosphere fun and entertaining their specialties include shapeups fades and tapeups im so glad i discovered this place in charlotte

to put it simply this particular kind of asian food exhibits a salty flavor profile with sauces and meat that can often taste like they come from a can its comparable to frozen meals available at supermarkets but comes with a higher price tag
the experience is satisfactory but not exceptional there isnt a wide variety of seafood options available making it quite similar to the other asian buffets in town
dont waste your time with the small rolls  go for the seabass appetizer instead
im not a fan of seafood but it was my husbands birthday and he adores it there were alternative choices besides seafood that brought me joy and my husband expressed his delight with his meal
the store had a lot of customers but there werent enough workers so the service was slow

this place holds a special place in my heart i just wish there were branches in california whenever im in arizona i make it a priority to visit here at least 23 times because the food never disappoints the atmosphere is always clean and the staff is exceptionally kind and awesome

while the bagels here are decent its the mouthwatering drinks that steal the show i especially enjoy their blackberry lemonade the interior might come across as sterile but dont let that discourage you it offers a cool and refreshing space with air conditioning and impeccably clean bathrooms given its prime location on state street this is quite impressive
which obgyn specialists have the best reputation

me and my buddies decided to check out a dennys restaurant around 1130 pm the experience was overall enjoyable with a cool waiter serving us i personally didnt eat anything but my friends did and they ended up getting sick after their meal

we decided to purchase one of the 9 stage systems and were really happy with how it regulates the ph of our ro water the prices for this high quality equipment are the best we could find and its a bonus that its made in the us instead of china

the service received was very friendly and the food turned out to be surprisingly good we tried the gyro and thought it was just as good as anywhere else despite arriving 5 minutes before closing time the food was fresh and did not taste old the only issue we had was the absence of green salad in the wrap i would definitely eat here again

being enthusiasts for dryaged meats isnt our thing since they often taste spoiled to us on the bright side the accompanying dishes are decent with nothing exceptional enough to generate enthusiasm or warrant a return visit

they offer delicious food at fairly reasonable prices typically averaging around 25 per person for dinner unfortunately their level of customer service and speediness is quite lacking often necessitating requests for additional drinks napkins or your check to make matters worse the person at the cash register actually had the audacity to inquire why i didnt leave a tip when the service was subpar

we purchased a 9stage system which impresses us by effectively regulating the ph of the reverse osmosis water we are particularly satisfied with its competitive prices for topnotch equipment and the fact that it is crafted in the united states rather than china adds to its appeal
its acceptable not exceptional with few seafood options and on par with the other asian buffets in town

this la nightclub epitomizes snobbish behavior with strict entry requirements such as being on the vip list or conforming to societal beauty standards as a result the general line turns into a mandatory queue where everyone must pay 50 per person or dress provocatively to increase their chances of getting selected leading to predominantly men being excluded
you wont be disappointed by the quality of the vegetarian dishes particularly the scrumptious spicy po boy and the irresistible chili fries
25 stars 2 hours for a detail and no wifi

i am smitten with this place if only they had branches in california without fail every time im in arizona i make a minimum of 23 visits here because the food is always topnotch the atmosphere is spotlessly clean and the staff are sincerely remarkable and considerate

on each occasion that i am in las vegas my desire to stop by this establishment for a nighttime treat becomes irresistible the culinary offerings are more than satisfactory with sizable portions that come at fairly affordable prices considering the setting is the bustling city of vegas moreover the space can comfortably accommodate sizable parties making it an excellent venue choice interestingly ive heard whispers that this place shares the same owners as the renowned cheesecake factory however my personal preference lies with this gem due to its abundant array of dining options even encompassing mouthwatering breakfast selections

the service provided by one of the female staff members was unsatisfactory and there were only a few options available for dining the taste of the food was average and did not meet our expectations considering the price and level of service however i was satisfied with how clean everything was
